mapper.insert: INSERT INTO recent_searches (user_id, search_term, search_date) VALUES (#{userId}, #{searchTerm}, NOW()) ON DUPLICATE KEY UPDATE search_date = NOW()
mapper.select: SELECT id, user_id, search_term, search_type, search_date FROM recent_searches WHERE user_id = #{user_id} ORDER BY search_date DESC LIMIT 5
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO popular_searches (search_term, search_type, search_count) VALUES (#{searchTerm}, #{searchType}, 1) ON DUPLICATE KEY UPDATE search_count = search_count + 1
mapper.select: SELECT search_term, search_type, search_count FROM popular_searches ORDER BY search_count DESC LIMIT 10
